name: Bootleggers
description:
Welcome to Bootleggers, a game about running booze and engaging in criminal activities ostensibly in 1920s New York. Inspired by works such as The Great Gatsby, this game for 3-6 players, including a GM, this game seeks to emulate the pursuit of unobtainable goals, the green light of the Gatsby novel. A simple system, involving a few skills and a six-sided die, Bootleggers seeks to encourage characters to chase their dreams but also to choose between those dreams and helping those around you. 

The 11ish page PDF should be an easy read, and the system itself is good for short sessions or one-shots, with simple character creation and rules. All feedback, assuming it is in good faith, is much appreciated. Enjoy!
